value:
$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|No, not here, either...$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Hello, Lyre. I see you're sneaking
away from camp. If I know you,
you're looking for Captain Ranulf.$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|No, I'm not!$k$pYou heard Commander Anna,
didn't you?$k$pHe's looking for peace and quiet,
which means WE won't be seeing
him today.$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Then who are you searching for?$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|What's it to you?$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Off she goes... Suspicious.$k$pWait just a minute, Lyre! I won't
let you snatch up the captain's
heart when I'm not looking!$k$p

$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|Lethe! There you are!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|Hey, little sister. Looks like you
got fitted for a kimono too!$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|It even matches yours! What do
you think?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|You look great.$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|Well, you said it. Hehe.$k$pI'm so happy we have the chance to
spend the New Year together!$k$pIf we want to go by tradition, we
should visit a shrine, play hanetsuki,
eat ozoni...$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|So this is what you're up to! How
nice that you can spend the day
with your sister.$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|Kyza!$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Without Captain Ranulf by my side,
that leaves me all by my lonesome...
Not that I'm lonely! Not one bit!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|Come on, Lyre. You're comrades in
arms. Do something!$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|Twist my arm, why don't you? OK,
Kyza. Want to come with us?$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Do you mean it?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|Of course we do.$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|I hope you appreciate how nice I'm
being!$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Thank you, Lyre. Now, time's wasting.
To the shrine!$k$pI'm told we can hang plaques with
our wishes on them, and I must find
a place higher than yours.$k$pI have already poured all my feelings
for the captain into mine.$k$pThis year, as always, I will be the one
of us that he cares most for. The race
is on, little cat-girl!$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|That's gratitude for you! HEY! Wait
a minute there! Oooh!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|Well, there they go again. Happy
New Year!$k$p
